mention.text: a young stockbroker by an officer looking for a burglar is one more strike against a police force already struggling with allegations of brutality and racism Terry D. Barnes , 24 , was shot between the eyes in his apartment Police
an officer investigating a report of a prowler
an officer investigating a report of a prowler
the seventh shooting death involving Kansas City police officers this year

the seventh shooting death involving Kansas City police officers this year In the previous three years , five people were shot and killed '' an officer investigating a report of a prowler just hope that this case will draw the line on where the police can kill an innocent man
a good man Terry would have been a good husband and a good father
a good husband and a good father
a good husband and a good father
